phrases: They are all working very hard.
This is the inside of a human body.
I have lost my way again!
The inside of the body is too complicated!
RED BLOOD CELLS: They carry oxygen and carbon dioxide using blood circulation.
By any chance, could this be?
It is the Red Bone Marrow!
This is the blood cells' homeland.
ENUCLEATION: When an Erythroblast releases its core and becomes a Red Blood Cell.
You are a full-fledged Red Blood Cell now, starting today.
This is where the blood cells are born and reside until they have grown up.
PRECURSOR CELLS: Cells before they are differentiated from Stem Cells into certain other cells.
Confirming the birth of a Precursor Cell!
We can make her a Red Blood Cell, right?
HEMOPOIETIC STEM CELLS: Cells that produce blood cells such as Red Blood Cells, White Blood Cells, Platelets, etc.
Let me know if you see any good ones!
It is here that the blood cells are produced by Hemopoietic Stem Cells,
Red Blood Cells come into this world as Precursor Cells,
and are nurtured by Macrophages inside this Red Bone Marrow.
ERYTHROBLASTS: Cells that are still being differentiated before they become Red Blood Cells.
They exist inside the bone marrow.
Cells that are still being differentiated before they become Red Blood Cells.
They exist inside the bone marrow.
All right, children, are we all here now?
I am the Macrophage in charge of this class.
I will be looking after you until you become full-fledged Red Blood Cells, all right?
MACROPHAGE: Inside the bone marrow, Erythroblasts cluster around the Macrophages, which play a crucial role in their differentiation and maturation.
Let us all do our best to become exemplary Red Blood Cells!
Let us get this down pat!
Now then, I wonder if you can do a good job delivering!
On your marks, get set, go!
I am going to do this, too!
It is neither this way nor that way!
That girl got so lost she is dizzy.
You will stop getting lost before you know it.
You do not have to panic, all right?
The blood vessel is not always a peaceful place.
Extremely scary bacteria pop up from time to time!
And so today, we are going to practice running away from bacteria!
When bacteria appears, hurry to a nearby corner and hide!
I have asked Neutrophil to play the role of the bacterium today.
WHITE BLOOD CELLS (NEUTROPHILS): Their main task is to eliminate foreign substances from outside, such as bacteria and viruses.
I bet this girl's going to lose her way and get eaten up!
Listen up when your teacher's talking!
What if I end up getting lost?
so you will not be able to leave the bone marrow.
If you are here inside the bone marrow, we can find you for sure!
Until they mature and undergo enucleation, Erythroblasts reside in the bone marrow.
Please do not let me get lost!
If you are scared, want to run away together?
Oh, is it okay for me to get started?
I wonder if you all managed to hide yourselves well.
Try not to get captured by that scary bacterium!
I have lost my way again!
That bacterium is scary, and I am lost.
There is no way I can ever become a Red Blood Cell!
Sorry to keep you waiting for your oxygen!
Now if you will excuse me!
I wonder if these people are Red Blood Cells.
Will I turn out like them someday, maybe?
Hey you, what are you doing here?
You are an Erythroblast, are not you?
A Red Blood Cell in the making.
Th-That is you in disguise, right, Teacher?
This is an evacuation drill, right?
Well, it is not really such a stretch for me to be called that!
After all, I am overwhelmingly above you in status!
you have got one thing wrong.
PSEUDOMONAS: One of the most common types of persistent bacteria existing in natural environments.
Where do you think you are going?
Erythroblasts cannot leave the bone marrow.
I do not have time for rules like that!
A bacterium like me, who can survive without stealing nutrients or oxygen...
Why do you think I made a point of coming inside this body?
I just adore tormenting helpless blood cells, that is why!
PSEUDOMONAS: Can divide and proliferate like crazy even without nutrients.
Once it enters a live body, it destroys blood cells and the cell system with a vengeance.
shall I finish you off now?
I do feel sorry for you.
After all, you are so young.
And you are going to die before you can become an adult.
Well, but that is your destiny!
I-I do not want to die!
Not in a place like this!
I mean, there is a chance that I could turn out like those cool Red Blood Cells, too!
Do not think you can lay a finger on a blood cell in this body, and live to tell the tale!
MYELOCYTE: Cells in the process of being differentiated, before they become White Blood Cells (Neutrophils, Eosinophils or Basophils).
They reside in the bone marrow.
I do not need to tell a germ my name!
Are you by any chance a Myelocyte?
A White Blood Cell in the making?
You think you are going to kill me?
I am going to take you out!
All so lively, are not you?
You little brats inside this body!
What impressive blood cells you are sure to become one day!
That is, if you manage to stay alive that long!
Destroying little squirts' dreams, smashing their pride to smithereens...
No wonder I cannot stop tormenting the weak!
Please do not die, Big Brother!
I do not dislike kids with courage!
If you hand over that Erythroblast,
I will spare just your life!
What is it going to be, little boy?
You really think I would do something like that?
Even if we, White Blood Cells, have to sacrifice our own lives,
I am going to be a great White Blood Cell!
All right, that is the spirit!
You are safe now, okay, you two?
All right, let us take care of those wounds right away.
Teacher, thank you very much for your help!
Thank you so much for rescuing me!
when we grow up and start working inside the blood vessels,
maybe we will see each other somewhere.
Ever since I started working, I have been so busy that I forgot.
But that did happen, did not it?
I am going to deliver this oxygen pronto!
No, I am the one who should be sorry.
We sure run into each other a lot.
Since I am free right now.
I wonder if he is an able White Blood Cell now?
It happened so long ago, I do not really remember his face.
No, but really, that would be too much of a coincidence, right?
Thank you so much for showing me the way!
It is been so peaceful lately!
I only wish this could last.
Some kind of weird cell is on the attack!
I have not seen you eliminate a cell in forever, Neutrophil!
KILLER T CELLS (CYTOTOXIC T CELLS): Mobilize under orders from the Helper T Cells.
They kill virus-infected cells, Cancer Cells and the like.
I know you looked out for Naive the other day.
Did he get infected with a virus, maybe?
Hard to stomach, is not it?
I am going to take this corpse into custody, all right?
Your main job is to kill bacteria, right?
It is not like we do not take care of cell-related trouble, too.
I mean, I am bored since no jobs have been coming in!
They patrol the entire body, attacking as soon as they spot Cancer Cells or viruses.
attacking as soon as they spot
I could not find a suitable cushion.
He is the type who proliferates at warp speed.
I am pretty sure his friends are still around, so...
Maybe I will ask that cell there to show me the way?
it is not just this one virus, right?
There are still some in my area!
Y-You should have spoken up sooner!
Well, that is what I have been trying to tell you all this time.
As it happens, I have been extremely idle.
Sorry, but I am going to take this job!
I do not want you guys to come along.
The last thing I need is to have you underfoot.
So I will be going off alone!
Wh-Why, you, who do you think you
I am powerful, so I will be fine.
Hey, Killer T. You all right?
We would not want you to catch a cold, so you go on home, young lady, and sit tight!
I am going to kill you!
I would like to see you try it!
They are allies, but they are killing each other!
Just what you would expect of immunity cells.
Th-They sure do not get along.
Maybe we should just leave them behind.
You do not have to come the whole way, okay?
The cells I am going off to kill might have been your friends or neighbors.
You would not want to see that, do you?
No, hey, I will be fine!
I will take you all the way.
Since it is for the sake of this world.
That was the first time I would ever been rescued.
That this is something we cannot do anything about.
That for the sake of world peace, sometimes your friends can get killed.
And also the fact that that is your job.
Anyway, who knew there were immunity cells who were sensitive to that?
Not that I can broadcast it in front of Killer T.
I thought that cells were living here...
There is no sign of them.
That virus's friends are probably laying low.
For now, let us report to HQ, and then we will patrol the area together.
No way in hell is that happening!
Then it will be two against two!
And I am taking our guide with me!
It would be so uncool if the Lone Wolf got herself lost, huh?
No way can I focus on my work if I am teamed up with someone like that!
Now I am freed from babysitting the moron!
Do not let your personal feelings get in the way!
It will get worse if we go along with her!
You do not know when to shut up, do you?
We should get started, too, right?
Since that pain in the neck is out of the way,
I will be glad to take you on, that is what I am saying.
Although if what you want is to die as someone else, feel free to stand pat.
Show me who you really are!
I am getting a bad vibe.
Come on, let me enjoy myself a little longer!
What happened to that cell kid?
There is something strange going on!
All three of you are here, I see.
